__comment: The beginning of Journey to The Far Lands! I'm going to start naming this 'jevent_3' instead of 'event_18' because that was getting confusing. September 19th, 2021.

description.text: Journey to The Far Lands III - September 19th, 2021
The Hungering Marsh stretches out before Deepwell. It is all that stands between you and the coastline, where you will build your ships.
